intro: Elatostema laxiflorum, commonly known as the slender-flowered elatostema, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is a small, herbaceous perennial that typically grows in moist, shaded environments. The plant features heart-shaped leaves with a smooth texture and produces small, greenish-white flowers arranged in clusters. It is native to parts of Southeast Asia, including China, India, and Indonesia. Due to its delicate appearance and unique botanical characteristics, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
